des:
With this skill, you can set a height for your standing desk, as well as lock/unlock the desk and turn the haptic feedback on or off.

TO GET STARTED:
Enable the skill from the Alexa skill store, open the Ergonomyx Voice Companion skill in your echo app and go to the settings menu to link your Alexa account to your Ergonomyx account. You’ll need to enter your Ergonomyx username and password here, once linked you will have full access to all of the functionality of this skill.

Here’s a handy list of voice commands you can use with our Alexa skill to control your Desk and Bike:
(all units are in imperial)
"Alexa, set desk height to 80" (minimum height is 71cm and maximum height is 114cm, any value out of this range is not supported)
"Alexa, set desk to sitting"
"Alexa, set desk to standing"
"Alexa, set desk to biking position"
"Alexa, set desk to locked/unlocked"
"Alexa, set haptics to off"
"Alexa, set haptics to on"
